website_summaries.verdict: A solid choice from a solid maker. Excellent max pressure spec of 10,000 PSI.
pros: Precise release of grease thanks to grease counter function
Flexible hose included for hard-to-reach jobs
cons: Battery and charger are not included with this purchase

website_summaries.verdict: Outpaces its competitors on construction and performance. Hands down the best available on the market.
pros: Its power and performance separate it from the rest of the pack
Exceptional battery life and very durable build
cons: It's expensive, but it has a lot to offer for the price

customer_reviews.title: Pump is great, tube sucks..a lot.
customer_reviews.text: Milwaukee makes some great stuff. They really use good electric motors and their tools take a drop and keep working.... Their grease gun tubes however, it's some real harbor freight stuff. I had new tube charging or priming issues, I had minimal feed. The pressure was great but the volume reduced this effect on its work. My tube blew up lol. Plunger , clip and washer all flew out. Spring went out and it was a garage sale of tube parts. I had a hand pump Lincoln tube. And that alone solved my problems. Instant prime, more volume and tubes are more completely empty. I'd still buy another since any $19 Lincoln grease tube will fit.
customer_reviews.author: Rosario Schifano

customer_reviews.title: Faulty cartridge design
customer_reviews.text: As others have noted, we changed out the tube cartridge for manual unit we had laying around and went from worthless to greasing heavy equipment with ease. Of and get a 4aH battery at minimum if you plan to grease large machines.
customer_reviews.author: Joe D

customer_reviews.title: Great, but....
customer_reviews.text: First off, love the grease gun. Would have been a five for sure but... As other reviewers have noted, grease gun simply won't prime. Spent a very frustrating hour and a half attempting to get prime. I think the problem is the plunger simply doesn't fit inside of grease gun tube. Finally gave up and purchased a $18 grease gun, screwed tube onto grease gun, and presto!! instantly primed.
customer_reviews.author: Bryson Dirks

customer_reviews.title: These guns are pretty indestructible
customer_reviews.text: Recently I had my grease gun fall out of the cab of my excavator, I did not realize it until the end of the day after I had scooped it up and put it into a truck with 50 tons of rock. It went through a rock crusher a pile of stone and ended up stuck to the magnet of another crusher. After it was retrieved I took it apart cleaned the stone dust out of the motor and it still works. As far as the guns not taking a prime I just figured out how to fix that by pushing the plunger while holding the trigger I hope this helps everyone else make their reviews five star reviews .
customer_reviews.author: August West

customer_reviews.title: Great if you already have 18 volt Batteries
customer_reviews.text: If you've got Milwaukee's that use the 18 volt already this is quite the heavy duty gun. I've got 3 Lincolns but their batteries last about one season and give up the ghost. I've had Milwaukee batteries now going on 4 yrs and have not had one go bad yet. Love all my Milwaukee tools. (2 drills, flashlight, saber saw, impact, all 18 volt) I will let you know if my opinion changes after using this for awhile. Sept 20th 2014. We've used this gun now for one planting season. Used heavily every day this spring with know problems at all. It's really a super machine. Really like the adjustable number of pumps.
customer_reviews.author: D Lane

customer_reviews.title: But I found that if you make sure the plunger goes inside the tube you have no problem priming it at all in fact the priming but
customer_reviews.text: I read some reviews that say priming is a bear on this particular grease gun. But I found that if you make sure the plunger goes inside the tube you have no problem priming it at all in fact the priming button on it is probably one of the best higher volume primers I've ever seen. We just received the grease gun from UPS the other day and greased the excavator with it and about a quarter of the time it normally takes. I would highly recommend buying this grease gun if you have a lot of greasing to do and have equipment machinery etc.
customer_reviews.author: kristine kellner

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely No response from seller.
customer_reviews.text: I received the Grease Gun and it was Had to prime the first time but eventually worked. Then the second cartridge Not at all even watched all the Milwaukee Videos on How To. Would not work So I emailed called etc... Filled out Amazon form and Have never received a response a response. I dont even want my money Back Just a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: sidney nelson

customer_reviews.title: Makes my job so much easier! Excellent tool to have!!
customer_reviews.text: As a profesional diesel tech I recommend this little devil, it makes my job so much easier, it’s very powerful, I’m very impressed, the speed option and dial settings are very useful, I use it everyday on tractors including the fifht wheels and forklifts with a 6.0amp M18 battery and it last forever, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Pjo04

customer_reviews.title: To easy.
customer_reviews.text: Like a lot of other people, why didn't I buy this along time ago. If you work off a mechanics truck taking care of construction equipment, you need this. I've read about people having problems with the factory grease tube threading back on but I haven't had a problem at all. The tube actually feels heavier than my standard Lincoln grease gun tube. Maybe Milwaukee fixed this. Already put a case of grease tubes through it with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: CJM515

customer_reviews.title: I love this tool
customer_reviews.text: I love this tool. I am getting ready to retire in the next couple years and I live on acreage. I have been purchasing implements for my tractor to make life a bit easier. I have so many items to keep lubricated now that it just made sense to finally purchase a portable lube gun like this to make life a little easier. It is so fast and adjustable so you do not waste grease. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Brost

customer_reviews.title: This is the best !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Like the Energizer bunny, it works, every time, and keeps on going. One hand needed on the unit, one on the hose, hold the fitting on the plug, squeeze trigger, item gets greased. Easy as breathing. A+++++, go Milwaukee Tools
customer_reviews.author: James William Huskey

customer_reviews.title: BEAST!
customer_reviews.text: I grew under on a farm ant when I was 10 I was helping to grease and maintain farm equipment. I have 39 years of experience doing heavy construction working with bulldozers, excavators, motor graders, scrapers and other equipment. I have used the Lincoln cordless electric for 15 years or so and this gun puts them all to shame! Money very well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Dale W.

customer_reviews.title: Weak, doesn’t hold up to abuse on a daily basis!
customer_reviews.text: After 4 months of use on a construction site, it will not put grease into pins requiring more pressure, I cannot adjust the tracks on an excavator or dozer it bypasses grease internally, loses prime all the time, as others have said the plunger sucks! Overall not satisfied and don’t recommend, the dewalt will destroy it!
customer_reviews.author: Ron fenoff jr

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I should have purchased one of these years ago. Makes lubing equipment almost enjoyable. This paired with a lock lube tip is the ultimate combo. Makes living much, much quicker and less mess.
customer_reviews.author: T.C.

customer_reviews.title: Love Milwaukee everything it's awesome
customer_reviews.text: Cuts the greasing process in half. Easy to use swapping out the tubes takes a little know how the first couple times for priming the gun. As a side note, don't put the lock-n-lube tip on here, you'll waste a lot of grease if the zerts don't match up exactly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall great.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work extremely well 95% of the time. Only thing I dislike is if you come to a stubborn fitting that isnt taking grease, the gun will shut off instead of laboring through to try and pump grease. Again, this is a rare occurence, and the convenience of this versus hand power is definitely worth it. I have used the Lincoln power luber before at a previous job and find this one superior to that.
customer_reviews.author: Bronco

customer_reviews.title: Good gun .
customer_reviews.text: a lot of pressure from gun. Have joint that wont take grease this gun should do it. Get the locking tip for it. It will blow the regular tips off the zerks .
customer_reviews.author: rooster

customer_reviews.title: The best gun on the market
customer_reviews.text: The best gun on the market . I bought it for a present for two friends. They both had trouble loading. Do not load it backwards which was the most common problem.
customer_reviews.author: C A

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I mean really really love it. I would recommend anyone to use it one time and say they don't want one of there own.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 months of use.
customer_reviews.text: Great grease gun but the tip is junk. Had to replace it right away. Used for 2 months now and the grease gun quit working. The light works but the pump on it is not functioning.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Greasy Peasey
customer_reviews.text: Freaking Awesome! I haven't had any issues with air lock or leaks.....I would buy again for sure. If you have a lot to grease you won't regret it. I'm using the bearing spec Schaeffer ( not the super tacky) and it's great...

customer_reviews.title: Best tool ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best tool ever. I am a farmer and use it daily on equipment. I had one fall out of an unlatched tool box on my service truck (battery too 8/) and lost it. That night I ordered another one. I will not be without this grease gun ever again.

customer_reviews.text: Really works good. Very happy with it. I have only pumped two cases of grease so I don't know how it will hold up in the long run but so far very happy with it.

customer_reviews.text: Awesome Tool and I’ve never had a problem with it air locking after changing the cartridge as it seems to self prime.

customer_reviews.text: Best grease gun ever, tested against Dewalt 20v and milwaukee 18v came out on top each time. Also love the auto counter and 1st gear power.

I got the smaller battery for it because it is a bit heavy alone. Would recomend Milwaukee tools to anyone and everyone.

customer_reviews.title: My husband is very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: This is the cadillac of grease guns. Went through several Lincoln's before purchasing this gun. My husband is very pleased with it. Also has a good warranty. Update: We had to use the warranty twice in a short period. Faulty switch was one problem. However, they fixed it both times at no cost and had quick turnaround. It still beats the Lincoln hands down. I think we went through five of those. We don't use the guns every day. We do septic installations and grease the machines as needed. To return it, you have to go online and print out a return label and drop it off at a Fedex location.

product_meta.title: Milwaukee 2646-20 M18 2-Spd Grease Gun Bare Tool
product_meta.description: The M18 Cordless 2-Speed Grease Gun delivers maximum pressure and unmatched versatility, offering an industry leading 10,000 PSI max operating pressure and a patent pending pre-set grease counter that allows service and maintenance professionals to dispense precise amounts of grease. The tools 2-speed design offers users the ability to select between max pressure and max flow rate. Other unique features include an on-board LED light, a lock-on/lock-off trigger, and a plunger rod with markings to gauge how much grease is left in the barrel. The tools stand up design and shoulder strap capability offer user convenience, while limiting fatigue and the 48 flexible hose offers greater accessibility when greasing hard to reach fittings. The new tool is also compatible with a clear barrel accessory. Powered by an M18 REDLITHIUM Battery pack, this is the industry's only 18V grease gun that's battery is compatible with a system of tools.
feature_bullets: Industry leading 10,000 PSI max operating pressure
48" flexible hose offers greater access to difficult to reach fittings
Air bleeder valve for quick priming
Lock-on / Lock-off trigger delivers added user convenience
New to world precision through Pre-set grease counter dial

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars460 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
